displayName.text: Tiny Hands & Tiny Toes Group Family Daycare

formattedAddress: 234 E 119th St, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 234 E 119th St, New York, NY 10035-4139, USA

originalText.text: I am delighted to share a glowing review for my child's daycare. The amount of knowledge and growth my child has experienced while attending this daycare is truly remarkable. Their program fosters a love for learning and provides a nurturing environment where children thrive. I couldn't be happier with the incredible educational journey my child has embarked upon at this daycare.

text.text: I am delighted to share a glowing review for my child's daycare. The amount of knowledge and growth my child has experienced while attending this daycare is truly remarkable. Their program fosters a love for learning and provides a nurturing environment where children thrive. I couldn't be happier with the incredible educational journey my child has embarked upon at this daycare.

originalText.text: If i could give 10 stars i would! I have my full trust in maribany and her staff. I have known maribany for almost 5 years now and the amount of love she has for the kids is unbelievable! My son has been a part of this daycare since he was 6 month old and still ask for her after school saying he wants to go see his favorite teachers ! Thank you guys for being amazing!

My son has been a part of this daycare since he was 6 month old and still ask for her after school saying he wants to go see his favorite teachers ! Thank you guys for being amazing!

originalText.text: Best Daycare in Harlem! We love how they care so much for the children, I would trust Maribany with my life honestly! Every morning you can smell the fresh food they make for the kids and the energy is unmatched!! Thank you guys for being amazing

text.text: Best Daycare in Harlem! We love how they care so much for the children, I would trust Maribany with my life honestly! Every morning you can smell the fresh food they make for the kids and the energy is unmatched!! Thank you guys for being amazing

originalText.text: Amazing service!! My kids love it here and I love how happy they are. Maribany  is the nicest person I have met, she treat everyone like family no matter what. They have such a great vibe here and the food is amazing. The kids are very safe and loved so much! Best decision to bring them to maribany thank you

text.text: Amazing service!! My kids love it here and I love how happy they are. Maribany  is the nicest person I have met, she treat everyone like family no matter what. They have such a great vibe here and the food is amazing. The kids are very safe and loved so much! Best decision to bring them to maribany thank you

originalText.text: My daughter started with Maribani and her team at 3 months. Everyone has always been so caring and truly care about the babies. My daughter learned so much being here . Best feeling was seeing her run with open arms to her bani or Karla. I wish we could have taken them with us to big girl school.
